alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 2:27AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Wakulla, southeastern Liberty, southwestern Leon and north central Franklin Counties through 315 AM EST... At 227 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Morgan Place, Brown House, Arran, Sanborn, Tully, Fort Braden, Panacea, Owens Bridge, Shell Point, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Medart, Buckhorn, Spring Creek, Twin Pole and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
